name: Herb!
description:
Herb! We need your help, we're almost out of supplies and none of the others have come back. Get out there and don't come back until you've got resources for the tribe!

Live the life of Herb, your tribe's slightly inept last hope at survival. Venture into the wilderness to collect resources and keep your tribe alive.

You'll encounter trees to chop, plants to gather, and animals to slay.

Be prepared to defend yourself, the boars round these parts are vicious.

Use wasd to move and spacebar or click to attack.
